h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
content: Now head up the middle cliff to find none other than the Yellow Wind Sage — only its a version of him from the past. Since your goal isn’t to fight this incarnation, you’ll actually be able to offer your help in defeating another Yaoguai King - a legendary and dangerous scarab who haunts the sands below.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Sandgate Bound'.
The content is as follows:
Now head up the middle cliff to find none other than the Yellow Wind Sage — only its a version of him from the past. Since your goal isn’t to fight this incarnation, you’ll actually be able to offer your help in defeating another Yaoguai King - a legendary and dangerous scarab who haunts the sands below.
